job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: strongData Scientist  BiotechbrbrstrongThis Jobot Job is hosted by Kat SarinasbrbrAre you a fit Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply button and sending us your resumebrbrSalary 120000  180000 per yearbrbrstrongA Bit About UsbrbrstrongWe are revolutionizing biotech with our product that measures the eyes reflexbrbrstrongbrbrstrongWhy join usbrbrbrstrongstrongWe are an exciting biotech start up that is looking to revolutionize the industrybrbrstrongJob DetailsbrbrstrongIdentify data sources how to collect and prioritizebrbrProcessClean databrbrIntegrate and store databrbrLook for correlationtrendsrelation between data sets that allows for improved diagnosis to measure treatment success to refine therapies etcbrbrUse of machine learning statistical modeling and artificial intelligencebrbrMeasure and improvebrbrCommunicate actionable insightsbrbrUtilizes statistical software programs eg SAS R to implement advanced statistical methodologies eg longitudinal data analysis survival analysis Poisson regression imputation methodologies and analyses with missing data and verify underlying distributional assumptionsbrbrstrongQualificationsbrbrstrongPrior experience in biological sciences pharmaceuticals medical devices in entrepreneurial environmentbrbrA minimum of eight 8 years of experience conducting statistical analysis for clinical research projects Masters or higher level degree in biostatistics statistics or a related field is requiredbrbrExcellent verbal and written communication and interpersonal skillsbrbrMust be a selfstarter able to work independently and have the ability to coordinate multiple activities simultaneously in support of various projectsbrbrInterested in hearing more Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply buttonbrbr
